panels.title: Overlaps: Europe | Italy Lag | China Lag | US

targets.query: SELECT mean("confirmed_cumulative")  - mean("death_cumulative") - mean("recovered_cumulative") FROM "summary_worldometers_country_86400" WHERE ("country" = 'China') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

select asd from (SELECT sum("confirmed_cumulative") - sum("recovered_cumulative") - sum("death_cumulative") as asd FROM "summary_worldometers_country_86400" WHERE ("country" != 'ttt') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear))

SELECT sum("confirmed_cumulative") - sum("recovered_cumulative") - sum("death_cumulative") FROM "summary_worldometers_country_86400" WHERE ("country" != 'China') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)
